definition: a difficulty that causes anxiety, to cause inconvenience or discomfort to
details:
noun
- a difficulty that causes anxiety
= synonyms: troublesomeness
- the quality of not being useful or convenient
- an inconvenient discomfort
= synonyms: incommodiousness
verb
- to cause inconvenience or discomfort to
= synonyms: bother, put out, disoblige, discommode, incommode, trouble
